website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for budget-friendly volume-limited wireless kids' headphones with absolutely no frills, the JLab JBuddies Studio Bluetooth will do the trick.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a year, poor warranty
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty nice for the low price, but they stopped working after about 1 year of school use (as a personal pair used by 1 student). That isn't so great. The product description talks about the lifetime warranty (for the wired version). What it does not tell you is that you pay to mail them back to the manufacturer. That's a sigificant fraction of the cost of a new pair. I'm going to send mine back and see what they do. According the the warranty FAQ, if they decide that the headphones weren't abused, then I will get an unspecified amount of store credit for their own online store with free standard shipping back to me. I'll report back.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stimson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little headphones for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter had a habit of wrecking corded headphones's jack plugs. Her last pair was by this maker, and she loved them and they held up well, but the same issue. These are VERY comfortable. My wife and I will even use them on occasion and we're full-sized adults. The materials are very nice. Soft earcups. Lightweight but feel sturdy and well made. They have great battery life. Easy operation. Most important: They're truly sound-limiting at 85dbs. No jacks and jack plugs to get ruined. She walks all over our house in them and loves that she can pause and advance tracks from the headset.
customer_reviews.author: SMB

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great quality
customer_reviews.text: My son (5 yo) uses these for this Kids Fire HD tablet (which is also an amazing product) and they work wonderfully. They get nice and loud, not too loud to damage his hearing. The sound is crisp and clear. They fold up to make them more compact when you store them. The cords are strong and I don't see them breaking anytime soon. The only issue I have is that I didn't order two of them which means I'm ordering another one because the value is just beyond what I expected
customer_reviews.author: AlaskanLost

customer_reviews.title: My son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these, and I don't have to worry about him damaging his hearing. He has a fairly large head, and they fit just fine. He's discovered the remote on his own, and really likes the feature. At first I thought the cord was a little short, but after seeing a kid actually use them, I think its a good length. If it was longer, he'd probably roll over the cord with a chair or get it caught on something since kids are less observant than adults.
customer_reviews.author: Maxon

customer_reviews.title: Our third pair
customer_reviews.text: After reading some tests that found few brands of volume limiting headphones truly keep volume from harming kids’ ears, I was pleased to find these at such a good price. Kiddo loves them and the adults in the house can wear them comfortably. There’s enough noise canceling from the padding to work well but not so much I cant get kiddo’s attention from across the room when I need to. We own both Bluetooth and wired. They last a few years which isn’t bad for this price. The mic is imperfect but that’s a small price to pay for avoiding permanent hearing damage.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Says

customer_reviews.title: Very durable for kids
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these headphone for both my kids (now 1st grade and 4th grade) and they are very durable. They fold up for easy storage in their backpacks and have a pretty good microphone. We had only used them previously for videos and audiobooks, but they became essential when we began virtual school last spring. My only complaint is I have had to pull apart the casing on one side to get the comfort lining back in place. Once I figured out they clicked together and it wasn't glued, it was pretty easy. No complaints on functionality. Very good for kids and have volume control to protect young ears.
customer_reviews.author: ltalbot11

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 6 year old for remote learning in a classroom with several other kids working at the same time. I personally haven’t tried them but she loves that they’re purple and has had no complaints about the sound. She doesn’t seem to be bothered by outside noise but can still hear and respond if you talk to her in a slightly louder than normal voice.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle M.

customer_reviews.title: USB Charging Jack Issues
customer_reviews.text: I do not have an issue with the overall operation of these headphones. I do have a problem with the quality of the workmanship. Specifically, the USB Charging jack. I purchased Qty 2 of these headphones and both charging jacks have broken off after < 1 months use. I would expect that a child should be able to plug in the Micro USB connector to charge the headphones without issue, but I guess I'm mistaken. Perhaps I may inquire on getting a replacement? I would not recommend purchasing these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Awful, just awful.
customer_reviews.text: Aweful, just awful. Flimsy, and moved around pn the ear. And even with the sound all the way up you could still hear the t.v. My kid and I looked at each other like "are these things for real? "
customer_reviews.author: carl

customer_reviews.title: Too quiet and broke in a few months.
customer_reviews.text: These were too quiet for my kids to use on the airplane (or they may have been loud enough if they had better sound isolation but they didn't), and then one pair is broken in a way that sends a signal to the tablet to pause every 2 minutes or so, leading to toddler tears and mama frustration.
customer_reviews.author: ka

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you need for Kids
customer_reviews.text: These rock. Easy to use and the functions for the kids to utilize are simple enough for my 4 yo to understand. These have been heaven sent for all the remote learning going on, the kids say these are the first headphones to fit comfortably let alone their cost is on point! These are so cost effective with their high quality we will be purchasing more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great For Kids
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, cute, functional headphones with a built-in mic. These are easy to adjust and for kids to put on independently, and I love that they fold flat(ish) for storage. My kids have had great luck with these during remote learning, and it is nice to have so many color options, so it is always clears whose headphones are whose.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Potyondy

customer_reviews.title: Solid product that holds up to kids
customer_reviews.text: We have four pairs of these headphones for our two children. We got our first two pairs for school last August and decided to buy two more this year so we could keep two pairs at home. They hold up to the hard use that kids can give products and they work great. I will continue to purchase these as needed!
customer_reviews.author: Gail B.

customer_reviews.title: Immortal headphones
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased our second set. The first one was purple, the second one is blue. My daughter has been using this purple model for 2 years now and it’s not given up on us. Any other set of headphones has never lasted longer than a few months. I just bought a second set so she can take one to school and keep one at home. The bang for the buck is absolutely incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Eisenhauer

customer_reviews.title: Safe, comfortable & dependable.
customer_reviews.text: I love how these headphones hold up to the abuse of a 6 year old and keep the volume safe. The braided cord is sturdy and doesn’t get tangled. My granddaughter likes them because they are comfortable on her head and ears. I purchased at least 3 other brands of headphones before these and they all stopped working. This is the second pair of this brand so we can have one for home and school.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Sound Quality and Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality of these are terrible! It sounds like your listening to music under water. They're also very uncomfortable and hurt your ears after just two minutes of use. It does have a microphone and pause button on the cord, as well as a max safe decibel limit for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Realistic Optimistic

customer_reviews.title: Holds record for not being broken in our house.
customer_reviews.text: My oldest son had went through double digit totals of headphones last year until we bought these. Definitely made well and durable. Only complaint, the muffs are a little loose. Other than that, better than any we have ever bought, and cheaper price than most of the others he had. Will buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: William Brimer

customer_reviews.title: We love these headphones!
customer_reviews.text: We have these in both purple and blue. I chose them based on some reviews of volume limiting headphones for kids that I found online. Having worked for an Audiologist; safety is important to me. My kids happily use these. I have borrowed them and they are comfortable even on my head.
customer_reviews.author: Janaya

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter will only wear these headphones! So, when it was time for her to go back to school where the require her to have headphones, I had to order another pain. Durable, long lasting for their price. My daughter is extremely hard on them, but they still work great.
customer_reviews.author: Echo Bass

customer_reviews.title: Wish there was more direction, but overall great!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our son for his first plane ride. Aside from having trouble hearing on the plane (which was fine since he’s only 20 months old) how to turn them on and connect them was difficult. We eventually figured it out, but we feel like it too way to long to get connected.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Chounet

customer_reviews.title: Great for picky kids
customer_reviews.text: The only headphones my son will wear. He hates when things squeeze his ears, and other headphones pull out his hair when removing them. This is our second pair so he can have one for home and one for school.
customer_reviews.author: MBABrim

customer_reviews.title: and be comfortable on her ears
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needs headphones for daily use at school. With the price and warranty, I had hoped these would hold up well, and be comfortable on her ears. Unfortunately, the ear cushions starting pulling away from the ear speaker. The sound is pretty good on them, but I would not recommend since they do not hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great kid headphones
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 6 and 9 year old nephews. They use it to play their video games and my sister has more peace & quiet now! It fits both if them perfectly and they say it’s comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: There's a reason they're cheap
customer_reviews.text: These headphones split at the entrance to the jack, and then the part of the headphone jack that inserts into the machine got stuck in our iPad and I had to get Apple to take it out. Silenced our iPad for a week until we could get it fixed. Go for a more reliable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ballentine

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: The volume is really limited so my kids don't like them a lot when we travel. But the connections are stable and the battery lasts a while.
customer_reviews.author: Stephane Budge

customer_reviews.title: Good durable design but no volume control on the headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, durable headphones. The wire is strong and does not seem to be easily broken or stretched. My son was thrilled with the purple and the softness of the over the ear material but was somewhat confused because there is no volume control, only a mute button. I tried them out and the volume is fine. The sound quality is pretty good as well. I would recommend these to others!
customer_reviews.author: Pualvr

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for kids
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 7yo who says earbuds are uncomfortable. They're great. We've had them 5 months now and they've held up fantastic. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jen86

customer_reviews.title: Not over ear. On ear.
customer_reviews.text: These are not over ear headphones as advertised. The sit on the ear and will cause discomfort over time. Hoped to get these for long plane rides, but these won't work for that.
customer_reviews.author: Papa

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good, but unless your child is in a quiet ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good, but unless your child is in a quiet setting the db limit will just frustrate many children. My child thought they were broken. While I appreciate the safety applied IMHO they aren't good for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great and volume control is a great plus and a must!
customer_reviews.text: Required for 1st grader. Volume control is a great plus and a must! The sound is great and the fit is perfect. I would absolutely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchase some headphones for my nieces (all above the age ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchase some headphones for my nieces (all above the age of 12). But the little girl, was too young (5 years old), for such big headphones. These Audio JBuddies worked perfectly for her and I found that she could not make the volume too loud.
customer_reviews.author: MiamiOne

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Even though they had a manufacturing issue the seller replaced with no charge. My son loves this pair of head phones.
customer_reviews.author: christina c

customer_reviews.title: Everyone is happy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my grandson! He loves them & nobody gets annoyed anymore when he is playing on the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice to have some sort of override or volume limit ...
customer_reviews.text: Our 7 year old uses these headphones daily and so far they've held up well. The volume limiter works very well, a little too well possibly. It would be nice to have some sort of override or volume limit adjustment. My son has to turns up the volume to full with these headsets in order to be able to hear his music or shows.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loves Them!!!
customer_reviews.text: He states they are comfortable and I like that they are wireless. (He can't chew the wires)
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Great child headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, Loved the fit and function! Perfect gift for a child's first BT headphones. @TheModelRocketeer building dreams. 👍
customer_reviews.author: The Model Rocketeer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for kids
customer_reviews.text: Working great so far with my daughter since she never complains about their fit or comfort. Definitely would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Matt K.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made - highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy. Excellent cord design. Overall these cans took abuse from kids on a cross country trip and back. I'm very pleased with them. (Edit: I should add that trip was in a packed minivan and kids did not go lightly on them at all)
customer_reviews.author: hadek

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my toddler for plane rides. Worked great my at first, but the pads kept falling off. In order to put them back on, you have to pop off part of the plastic that’s attached to wires. So obviously after a couple times popping those off, the wire detached and now only one ear works. Pretty disappointed in these!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Fazio

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these headphones at the start of the school year and they fell apart by the end of the first semester. Rather disappointed. We are no longer in the return window, but would have expected them to last more than 3 months for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Buck

customer_reviews.title: Not loud enough to listen to audiobooks.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the headphones for my eight year old to listen to audiobooks. The volume does not go up loud enough to hear the books. Now I can't return them because I bought them early for her birthday assuming they would work properly. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect headphones for our kids
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are, according to our kids (5 and 7), very comfortable, easy to wear and adjust, and do a great job keeping the volume at a safe level. This is our second pair for the kids (the first ones had to go to school for use during class) and we wouldn't hesitate to get them again.
customer_reviews.author: Carla J Sak

customer_reviews.title: Braded cable and comfy ear pads!
customer_reviews.text: These seem to work well and have some isolation which is great for road trips. Braided cable is a nice touch you don't see on many adult headphones! Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: LFP

customer_reviews.title: Construction is suspect
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality but the construction of the headphones is a little suspect. We bought two and within a day one broke just trying to adjust the size of the headphones to fit on child's head. Amazon was quick to replace it with a new one so that was good.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Smyth

customer_reviews.title: Not the most rugged headphones
customer_reviews.text: Kids seem to like them but one of the phones broke off on both pairs I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew F.

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up.
customer_reviews.text: 6 months and both pairs, 2 different children, are failing.
customer_reviews.author: E. Warnke

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend for 8yo above as per son's reaction
customer_reviews.text: My son says his ears hurt when he uses it for half-day for school. Maybe because he is 8yo? but it can fit in my head and is adjustable. Soundwise,it is good.
customer_reviews.author: iSTAR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for school
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what my son needed for school. They fit him well and he said they were comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: Perfect headphones for my both of my daughters 3 and 9. Easy to adjust, comfortable, and good sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Ear pads are hot
customer_reviews.text: I hate the cans on my head, they’re hot & uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: WLD

customer_reviews.title: Great kids headphones
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves them. He says they are comfortable, and, because of the volume limiter, I don't have to worry about his hearing being damaged.
customer_reviews.author: BlindArchangel

customer_reviews.title: They work great for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: They work great for my daughter. I love the fact that they fold up easy so that she can toss them in her bag without worrying about them breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Yes, you should get these.
customer_reviews.text: Incredible quality of sound for this price range. Super surprised. My son bought these after some quick research and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: leila banner

customer_reviews.title: Best kids wireless headphones!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite headphones for my son! Overall very good quality and work great. Don’t have to worry about my son yanking the cord out his tablet. Only reason I gave 4 stars is because the volume is kind of low compared to the Jbuddies wired headphones and it took a minute for the tablet to discover the headphones
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: volume is too small
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headphone for my daughter and it is used for distance learning. Volume was too small so that hard to catch tracher‘s voice. I understand volume is limited for kids safety but just too small. Sound quality is not excellent but enough for our purpose.
customer_reviews.author: mic

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit great
customer_reviews.text: These didn't fit my 7 yr old very well. The cushions were too large for on ear and too small for his ears to fit inside the donut. He has to wear headphones for a few hours for learning so we are sending these back.
customer_reviews.author: flangel813

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Replacement works perfect. Love these for my 7, 5 and 3 year old
customer_reviews.author: Loveshopping

customer_reviews.title: These arrived on time and in great condition. They are exactly like advertised and meet ...
customer_reviews.text: These arrived on time and in great condition. They are exactly like advertised and meet all of the requirements I had. I use them for PS4 and, aside from being a little quiet, and having a shorter cord, they perform great. Thanks JLab!!
customer_reviews.author: JustinAlexander

customer_reviews.title: they feel nice. Sound limiting works
customer_reviews.text: Build quality seems okay, they feel nice. Sound limiting works. Sound quality is very mediocre, but a small child isn't likely to be picky.
customer_reviews.author: Echo

customer_reviews.title: Trouble with lifetime warranties
customer_reviews.text: I really like these headphones... I have gone through 6 of them tho... they break easily. Trouble getting replaced ,even with the lifetime warranties. I just ended up repurchasing them instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kamika Byrd

customer_reviews.title: JLAB wireless headset for home schooling
customer_reviews.text: This headset is not working well, wireless connectivity is intermittent, volume is not working properly with MAC. very disappointing, paid $30 which is useless now for my daughter... Want to get a refund back but it pass the 30 day return policy of Amazon..
customer_reviews.author: Satish Bala

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but flawed 3.5" connector
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through four sets of these head phones for two kids, based on the recommendation of wirecutter website. But the 3.5" audio connector keeps breaking. I attached a photo showing this one is about to break.
customer_reviews.author: N.R. Voss

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these headphones!
customer_reviews.text: My son has gone through a couple of different headphones and these are his favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Marena

customer_reviews.title: Top-notch headphones for kids!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these headphones after they were recommended by The Sweet Home/Wirecutter and we are so pleased by them. Our six-year-olds used these on a recent trip abroad and they were comfortable and easy to store in backpacks (thanks to the nice folding mechanism) and they feel really sturdy. Strongly recommended these fellas!
customer_reviews.author: Sam M.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones! I’ve been using them for my kiddos for quite awhile now. My 11 year says they are too small however on her ears. I think they may benefit from making a ‘Junior’ size.
customer_reviews.author: A. Decker

customer_reviews.title: My kids of various ages love them
customer_reviews.text: They are fantastic and very durable. love the fabric covered cording.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Sound is not good
customer_reviews.text: There seems to be no Volume control on the headphones themselves. They don't get very loud. If you are in a room with other noise it is hard to hear what you are listening to. Child seems to tolerate them.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 6 year-old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for 6 year-old Soft to the touch Limited volume
customer_reviews.author: Marcela Cruz & Jaime Granados

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great product for kids. My daughter loves them and so far are strong enough and she hasn’t been able to break them
customer_reviews.author: CuasiJoe

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with them at 1st, they had great noise cancellation for my daughter, even with the volume turned all the way up. That didn't last very long though, they quit working after about 2 months. When you plugged them into any electronic device, it didn't matter there was no sound coming out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Sauntia Van Hill

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!!
customer_reviews.text: What I dislike is that my account was hacked and I called amazon to let them know. I'm blocked from my own account, but the hacker is the one who received this item. Even after I reported it to amazon. You'll have to ask them how they like it. I WOULDN'T KNOW!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: leigh ormsby

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Second pair no better than the first cheeped ones at Walmart work better
customer_reviews.author: Randy W.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones. I wish they folded
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. I wish they folded, but otherwise I am very pleased with the volume. Great for little kids who always want to overdo it on the volume. I have bought several pairs, as the kids tend to lose them. But none have broken.
customer_reviews.author: NVC

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son hasnt even jad these a month and the charger port is broken
customer_reviews.author: maria tyler

customer_reviews.title: What!? I can’t hear anything. Hard pass.
customer_reviews.text: These were way too low at max volume. No way the kids could hear on the airplane with these, which was the whole reason for getting them. Even at home they’re extremely low sounding. Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: David Olinsky

customer_reviews.title: Good kids option for headphones
customer_reviews.text: the product is very light and sound pretty good for the price of the headphones. Pairing was a little problematic but it finally worked
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mic stopped working after a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this item. Microphone stopped working after a couple of months. Product has lifetime warranty but you have to ship it back and that ends up costing almost the same as a new product.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Gonzalez Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Quit charging in days
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are the worst. We've been through two pairs since the beginning of September, both of which no longer charge. The first pair last about three days. The second pair lasted about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Chism

customer_reviews.title: ON ear, not over
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and good quality, but ON ear, not over, for my 5yo with average sized ears.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Skelton

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable and fun
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. I use them for a computer music program. I love the neon colors.
customer_reviews.author: Cy Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but not for Plane trips.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip on a plane - discovered that they are not loud enough for your average plane. Ended up taking off my noise reducing headphones and putting them on my 3 year old instead. If you want them for day to day use, they'll work just fine, and I believe would be fine for a car trip. But if you're going to be in a plane, just understand that the plane will likely be louder than any of the "volume limiting" products out there. That said, my 3 year old son seems to like them, and actually left them on for a while, before he got frustrated at not being able to hear.
customer_reviews.author: B. Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The plug snapped off in my iPad the first day we used them.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Earphone did their job
customer_reviews.text: I bought the earphones for my granddaughter, she seems to be very pleased with them, she is in fourth grade and taken virtual classes because of the pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for my son's school
customer_reviews.text: This product was specifically suggested on my son's 2nd grade school supply list rather than ear buds. The product arrived quickly and my son is happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Potter

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sound and Very Cool
customer_reviews.text: It has a very good sound quality for the price and it is very cool. My kid just loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Trindas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love that the cord is not plastic and won't tear easily for my kid.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and excellent battery life
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 5 yr old and he loves them. The battery seems to last forever and he only charges them every 2 or 3 days. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Troy West

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: My boys like them very much and now all is quieter in the house. They work nice and look cool, and I am happy about the volume limitation, which has always been a concern.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken, after 2 weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: The charging plug broke after two weeks; headphones are now unusable.
customer_reviews.author: mrmerlin

customer_reviews.title: Low quality earphones
customer_reviews.text: Cord is short, sound is very low lower than my tablets original sound. Very dissatisfied. Didn’t state it was a kids earphones. Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Venus Morris

customer_reviews.title: These work great. They fit my 4 year old's head perfectly ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great. They fit my 4 year old's head perfectly with room to grow. I love the sound limiting since he likes to up the volume on everything.
customer_reviews.author: child.of.eve

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Won’t get to loud (so the kids don’t hurt their ears) really comfy, kids love them
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Got these headphones for my kids for their computer/game time. Kids love them, I love them, and noise is managed. The volume control really does work, even when the kids turn it all the way up it's still a safe level for their little ears.
customer_reviews.author: Ripple

customer_reviews.title: JLab JBuddies Headphones
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our 10 yr old granddaughter and she loves them. The cord is so durable and they are comfortable too. We love that they are volume safe as she always wants everything so loud.
customer_reviews.author: Chrary

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones, but i accidentally lost them on the public bus, so they are lost for the ages.

customer_reviews.title: Will not charge after 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 pairs of these for my kids 2 months ago. They love them but 1 of the headphones no longer charges.

customer_reviews.title: Won't Hold Up
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used this in kindergarten for three months and then all sound to the headphones stopped. Not good quality!

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my kids for school use as they each need a pair for computer time. They work well but the cord is coming apart already after less than a month's use and they no longer work. I am very disappointed.

product_meta.title: JLab Audio JBuddies Over-Ear Kids Wired Headphones | Toddler Headphones | Kid Safe | Studio Volume Safe | Volume Limiter | Folding | Adjustable | Noise Isolation | with Mic | Graphite/Blue
feature_bullets: MADE FOR KIDS: Standard headphones are designed for adults and are too big for kids. Our JBuddies over-ear headphones were specifically designed for children so that the headphones fit comfortably and don’t fall off. Over-ear design with comfy Eco Leather Cushions and padded headband offer all-day comfort for all ages, from grade school tykes to teens.

VOLUME LIMITER: How loud are your kids listening to music or their favorite youtuber? When children are young their ears are more susceptible to damage caused by loud sounds. The JBuddies offer safe-volume control, with built-in volume regulators, to ensure kids never rock out past 85db. And each pair is still designed with JLab's crystal-clear clarity in mind.

WHENEVER, WHEREVER: Hook up the tangle free, braided-nylon cord equipped with an in-line mic for taking calls, and controlling music with just a click or two. The 90-degree jack rocks with all devices and cases. And the compact, adjustable headband fits growing kids from ages 6-16.

COMFORTABLE FIT: The plush circular cups fit perfectly on your ears and provide a comfortable listening experience you can use all day. Pinch-free hinges keep your little one’s fingers safe. The easy adjustable headband allows you to get the perfect fit. The headband is also made of plush leather material to so it’s comfortable to wear, so much so you might forget you are wearing headphones.

LIFETIME WARRANTY/30 DAY GUARANTEE: We are so sure you’ll be happy with your purchase that we offer a “30-Day Money-Back Guarantee” to ensure customer satisfaction of our Jlab products. Also included with our wired products is a lifetime warranty to ensure you are covered in case any issues with our products arise.
